name: Manyman - Stunt Double Action
description:
Manyman is a superhero in a world in which there is no need for superheros. The movie industry hired Manyman to star in movies as a Stunt Double, but there is a catch... they also hired real monsters to save a penny on make up artists D:

CONTROLS: 

 -WASD/Arrow Keys for movement!

 -Press the spacebar to jump!

 -Press E to spawn an attacking copy of Manyman!

 -Press Q to spawn a stationary copy of Manyman!

Both copies will mimic your movement, watch out!
